rooms.description: Entry hall with Vastu aligned north direction for positive energy flow.
Living area in the south-west corner as per Vastu guidelines.
Functional kitchen located in the southeast corner to harness fire element energy, with proper ventilation and light.
Primary bedroom on the north-west side with a spacious balcony to enhance relaxation. Vastu recommends north-west for calm and clarity.
Secondary bedroom on the south-east side with a spacious balcony. Vastu guidelines for secondary bedroom support energy balance.
Master bathroom adjacent to primary bedroom following Vastu water element alignment.
Bathroom near the secondary bedroom in a well-ventilated area.

openings.description: Main entrance door placed in the north-east for auspicious entry.
Window ensuring natural light and ventilation as per Vastu recommendations.
Kitchen window facilitating optimal light and air circulation following Vastu guidelines.
Window on the balcony of bedroom_1 ensuring privacy and light balance in accordance with Vastu.
Window on the balcony of bedroom_2 ensuring adequate light and air flow according to Vastu.

rooms.description: Master bedroom on the first floor placed in the north-west zone with a balcony for relaxation and adherence to Vastu principles.
Guest bedroom on the first floor located in the south-east zone with a balcony for extra space and Vastu compliance.
Study or additional workspace area placed near the living room area for convenience.
Bathroom adjacent to master bedroom ensuring privacy and comfort.
Guest bathroom placed strategically for ease of access.

openings.description: Staircase connecting the ground floor and first floor; designed to ensure smooth transition in accordance with Vastu.
Window for study area ensuring proper natural light and ventilation.
